name: Solar System (itch) (sydneypb)
description:
This is my Solar System project for CAS 117. I added the following elements:

Sun, Saturn, Mercury, Earth, Moon, Mars, and Comets. 

I followed the 15 step tutorial on how to create this project, and some other elements I added were a second camera, scripts to make the planets rotate, materials on the planets, sound effects for the planets, and a spawner for the comets.

Credits:

Created by Sydney Bowler
